p: Available data in Argentina suggests that Cx. quinquefasciatus mosquito would act as a main vector, while Picui ground dove ( Columbina picui) and Eared dove ( Zenaida auriculata) would be important hosts in urban and rural environments [13]â€“ [16]. However, an alternative transmitting rodent-mosquito cycle was postulated in Argentina for genotype VII SLEV strains (CorAn-9124, CorAn-9275), isolated from rodents [14].
